title: 特朗普团队内部人士：从现在起到选举日，每三到四天会对中国和中国公司采取惩罚性行动
contents:
让支那尝一尝特朗普铁拳，看支那还敢不敢乱吠“对等制裁”

https://twitter.com/AMFChina/status/1295934974668021760

“I’ve been told by Trump campaign officials and administration officials to expect an announcement of punitive action against China and Chinese companies every three to four days between now and Election Day.”
